Lyric:
[by:Where-is-he]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:07.16]I keep coming back to that moment
[00:10.23]Where it all fell apart
[00:14.33]So I try and drink my emotions
[00:17.56]'Til I can't feel my heart
[00:21.45]And I don't understand
[00:25.11]How you slipped through my hands
[00:28.88]And I do all I can
[00:33.12]To get you out of my head
[00:36.81]So when I call you in the middle of the night
[00:39.55]And I'm choking on the words 'cause I miss you
[00:44.21]Baby don't tell me I'm out of time
[00:46.44]I got so much of my loving to give you
[00:50.23]In the middle of the night
[00:57.55]In the middle of the night
[01:01.94]I need you
[01:04.87]In the middle of the night
[01:06.06]I've got no good explanation
[01:09.02]For what I put you through
[01:13.31]Managing my expectations
[01:16.39]Is what I never do
[01:20.10]Yeah and I don't understand
[01:24.00]How you slipped through my hands
[01:27.50]And I'm trying all I can
[01:32.18]To forget you again
[01:35.65]So when I call you in the middle of the night
[01:38.33]And I'm choking on the words 'cause I miss you
[01:42.99]Baby don't tell me I'm out of time
[01:45.28]I got so much of my loving to give you
[01:49.06]In the middle of the night
[01:56.29]In the middle of the night
[02:00.78]I need you
[02:05.01]So when I call you in the middle of the night
[02:07.91]And I'm choking on the words 'cause I miss you
[02:12.49]Baby don't tell me I'm out of time
[02:14.77]I got so much of my loving to give you
[02:20.39]In the middle of the night
[02:27.64]In the middle of the night
[02:32.09]I need you
[02:34.99]In the middle of the night
[02:42.35]In the middle of the night
[02:46.75]I need you
